title: Sound On: Top Primaries to Watch, Congress Agenda Deadline
itunes:title: Sound On: Top Primaries to Watch, Congress Agenda Deadline
description:
Pangaea Policy Founder Terry Haines discusses the crowded congressional agenda ahead of the midterm elections. Bloomberg Government elections reporter Greg Giroux discusses one of the busiest voting days of the 2022 elections - this Tuesday - with primaries in Idaho, Kentucky, North Carolina, Oregon, and Pennsylvania. Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discussed the midterms and the to-do list for Congress 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
